text: wkma abtlynak -ayha alrswl- baedayk min almushrikin abtlyna jmye al'anbia' -elyhm alslam- baeda' min mrdt qawmahum waeda' min mrdt aljn, yulqy bedhm 'iilaa baed alqawl aldhy zyanwh balbatl; lyghtr bih sameh, fayudilu ean sabil allh. walaw 'arad rabik -jll wela- lhal baynahum wabayn tilk aledawt, wlknh alabtla' min allh, fdehm wama ykhtlqwn min kadhab wzwr
